name: Eustress Engine
description: Next-generation game engine built 100% in Rust. Create, share, and play interactive 3D experiences with unprecedented performance.

ai-training.name: Eustress Export Protocol (EEP)
ai-training.description: Train AI models with consented 3D spatial data. Export entities, scenes, and hierarchies in TOON format for 50% token reduction.

mcp-server.name: Model Control Protocol Server
mcp-server.description: AI-controllable 3D world server. Execute Rune scripts, manage entities, and stream real-time spatial data via HTTP, WebTransport, or WebSocket.

sdk.name: EEP SDK
sdk.description: Official SDKs for Rust, Python, and Node.js to integrate with Eustress Export Protocol for 3D AI training pipelines.
